comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: visualweb1994 on November 12, 2023, 03:19:26 PM**Lifetime Directadmin Hosting Plans**I've had cheap webhosts disappear within the year I paid upfront. What guarantees can you give that you won't do that?Quote ##**Payment Methods**  PayPal payments are available. We recommend using Cards via Stripe Payments. Razorpay(Cards, UPI, Netbanking, GooglePay etc),No Bitcoin? Why are you posting it here if it's not Bitcoin related? Follow-up question: why have you created 6 more or less similar topics over the years?
